title: Houseplant Identification
description: How well do you know your indoor green companions? Test your knowledge of popular houseplants and their care!

questions.question: Which houseplant is nicknamed "Devil's Ivy" because it is nearly impossible to kill?
What popular houseplant has long, sword-shaped leaves and is also called "Mother-in-Law's Tongue"?
Which houseplant produces baby plantlets on long runners that dangle from the mother plant?
The Fiddle Leaf Fig gets its common name from the shape of its leaves resembling what?
Which houseplant genus is known for colorful patterned leaves that fold up at night like praying hands?
What common houseplant has glossy, dark green leaves and produces white spathe flowers?
Which houseplant is known for its thick, glossy, dark green leaves and milky sap when cut?
The ZZ Plant (Zamioculcas zamiifolia) is popular because of what trait?
Which trailing houseplant has heart-shaped leaves and is in the same family as Monstera?
What houseplant is known for its coin-shaped round leaves and is also called the "Chinese Money Plant"?
Which houseplant is famous for purifying indoor air and was part of NASA's Clean Air Study?
The Cast Iron Plant (Aspidistra elatior) earned its name because of what quality?
Which popular houseplant has waxy, star-shaped flowers and is sometimes called the "Wax Plant"?
What is the common name for Epipremnum aureum, one of the easiest houseplants to grow?
Which dramatic houseplant has large leaves with natural holes and splits, growing bigger as it matures?
